data.title: Applicant Background Check Live Scan
data.meta_description: If you are looking for the right LiveScan for Applicant Background Check processing; look no further, we have the most cost effective and the best Applicant LiveScan solution. Biometrics4ALL’s Applicant LiveScan solution is certified by the FBI, FINRA, Transportation Authority (AAAE/TSC), National Indian Gaming Commission (NIGC), First Advantage, Cal-DOJ, NV DPS, FDLE, AHCA, IL ISP, NY DCJS, GBI, etc.
data.text: Biometrics4ALL offers the most cost effective and the most technologically advanced Applicant LiveScan solution. Our LiveScan system is the most intuitive to learn with built-in context sensitive instructional/help videos to provide instantaneous assistance when you need it. Our live scan software is compatible with virtually every fingerprint scanner models including Crossmatch/HID, Integrated Biometrics/IBT, Idemia, Jenetric, Suprema, i3, and Cogent/Gemalto/Thales/Greenbit; therefore, we can offer you an unbiased opinion of which scanner hardware suits you the best based on your budget and expectations. Biometrics4ALL’s Applicant LiveScan solution is certified by the FBI, FINRA, Transportation Authority (AAAE/TSC), National Indian Gaming Commission (NIGC), Sterling Identity, First Advantage, DCSA, Cal-DOJ, NV DPS, FDLE, AHCA, IL ISP, NY DCJS, GBI, etc. Greater than 90% of prospective customers choose our LiveScan solution over all other competitors. We are confident that once you learned more about our solution, services, and functionalities, you will reach the same conclusion.
